details.head: DETAILS
details.info: Detailing brushes are small, precise tools for cleaning tight spaces and delicate surfaces. Ideal for automotive, art, and electronics care, they ensure thorough and careful cleaning.

details.head: HOW TO USE
details.info: Detailing brushes are used to clean intricate and hard-to-reach areas of your vehicle, such as vents, trim, and wheel spokes. Gently brush these areas with soft, circular motions to remove dust, dirt, and debris without causing scratches.
